description: 2013 New Model with Latest USB 3.0 Technology- NEW VIA VL812 Chipset Solution with lastest developed 2013 version firmware for much better PC/MAC support- External power adapter for better performance- Plug-and-Play and hot-swap compatible; No driver requiredSystem Requirements- Supports: Windows 8/ 7/ Vista/ XP/ 2000 and Mac and Linux 9- If you encounter other performance concerns, please contact us at 24*7 mailbox: care@KDLINKS.com, all emails would be replied in 24 hours, no exception.Compatibility / Charging- This hub is not designed to serve as a standalone charger and will not charge an iPad tablet or any other device with non-standard charge requirements.- 2.4Ghz wireless devices, such as wireless keyboard and mouse adapters, may not work with USB 3.0 HUB. Please use PC USB 2.0 port.What is Included- kdLinks 4-port USB 3.0 Hub- 12V 2A power adapter- 3ft USB 3.0 Cable- User ManualAbout kdLinksThank you for visiting Our Storefront! kdLinks is registered trade mark by kdLinks Inc. It's a design force dedicated to creating top quality, fashion-forward devices. Through innovations in design and manufacturing, we are trying our best to offer truly unique, fashion-inspired products to the modern consumer.
title: KDLINKS® Super Speed USB 3.0 5Gbps 4 Ports Hub w/ Power Adapter (VIA VL812 Chipset - USB 2.0 compatible)
